citation.title: Identifying comparative sentences in text documents

linkedin.title: Sentiment Analysis in a contextual situation.
linkedin.summary: What do you mean by enemy ?  Do you mean opinion holder or competitor brands ? opinion holder can be person, group or organization which holds the opinion. If you are pointing to opinion holder, then you need to identify person name, group or organizations

author.name: Vineet Y.
author.group_description: This group brings together people who are working in the Text Analytics field (also known as Text Mining or Information Extraction) or people who are interested in web mining.  The group is of interest to people working in Language Technology (Natural Language Processing, NLP) or Data Mining.
